Description:
High-velocity alloy-based shell used in railgun-type weapon systems, including mass drivers.

Trades explosive power for unrivaled armor penetration, extremely effective on heavy-type warships but performance falls dramatically on lighter targets.

Type: Ballistic/Magnetic
Size: 300mm
Role: Offensive
Armor Penetration: 200 cm
Component Damage: 70 hp
Muzzle Velocity: 3000 m/s
Range: 21,000 m
Volume: 0.75 mÂ³
